#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
unsigned long long int factorial[25];
int main()
{
	int i,s;
	for(i=0;i<25;i++)
		factorial[i]=0;
	factorial[0]=1;
	for(i=1;i<=20;i++)
		factorial[i]=factorial[i-1]*i;
	
	int t,n;
	unsigned long long facn,ans=0;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		facn=factorial[n];
		ans=0;
		s=1;
		for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
		{
			ans=ans+(facn/factorial[i])*s;
			s=s*-1;
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
}
